DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Sediment Data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: CSV file containing data on sediment granulometrics determined by a laser diffraction particle size analyzer for sediment from 7 sites along the Northern Gulf of Mexico. Each row is a sample and the columns give different summary statistics grain size distributions.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Coastal Ecology
Community composition
animal-sediment relationships
habitat
Estuary
